name: 嵌入式系統程式設計
description:
本課程透過講授、閱讀、討論及問題解決教學與實作方式的設計，介紹下列數種嵌入式系統的結構/概念，
．在CentOS（Linux）下操作Wiscore Arm7 嵌入式系統（三星4510+Xilix CPLD）
．Keil C與Silab實驗板
．Microblaze嵌入式系統
來培養學生對應系所所需的核心能力。
goals: 具備嵌入式系統的基礎知識
具備嵌入式系統程式設計實作與測試分析的能力
具備嵌入式系統軟/ 硬體協同設計規劃/ 模擬與下載驗證能力
培養描述問題能力，能獨立思考
培養電路與程式偵錯能力
syllabus:
1.  Introduction to embedded systems and SoC platform
2.  Review of microprocessor system design
3.  Reading switches and adding structure to your code
4.  Meeting real-time constraints and creating an embedded OS
5.  Multi-state systems and function sequences
6.  Case study
7.  Use Vivado to build an Embedded System  and Add IP cores in PL
8.   Custom IP to the system and Software Writing and Debugging  for Timer
9.  MidTerm
10.  Embedded Linux on the ARM Cortex-A9
11.  Custom Hardware Development and Interface
12.  Device driver and interrupts servicing mechanism
13.  Custom Device Driver Development
14.  Build and Boot an Image
15.  Application Development and Debug
16.  Networking and TCP/IP
17.  Hardware-software co-design in an embedded system
18.  Final Exam
